document.text:
From: 
To: BOBBI C STERNHEIM 
<
Cc: Christian Everdell < 
Subject Re: Ghislaine Maxwell 02879-509 
Date: Thu, 19 Nov 2020 15:36:52 +0000 
>, "Mark 
S. 
Cohen" 
She is not in the SHU. 
>>>  BOBBI C STERNHEIM a> 11/19/2020 10:36 AM >>> 
Thank you. 
Please confirm whether she is in her isolation cell or in the SHU. 
Bobbi 
BOBBI C. STERNHEIM, ESQ. 
Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim 
New York, NY 10011 
Main: 
Cell: 
Fax: 
This message and any attached documents contain information from the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim 
thot may be confidential and/or privileged. 
if you are not the intended recipient, you may not read, copy, distribute, or use this information. 
if you have received this transmission in error, please notify the sender immediately by reply e-mail and then delete this 
message. Thank you. 
On Nov 19, 2020, at 10:29 AM, wrote: 
Bobbi-
I received your email after hours yesterday and just haven't had a chance to respond yet. 
Your client came in close contact with a staff member who tested positive. Out of an abundance of caution and for the 
safety of Ms. Maxwell, staff, visitors and other inmates, MDC Brooklyn has placed Ms Maxwell in quarantine status. She as 
you are aware was tested into quarantine and will be tested out in approximately 14 days. Once all the tests are negative 
she will be placed out of quarantine. Her legal calls and discovery will continue. She will be unable to have in person legal 
visits to protect visitors from potential exposure. 
>>>  BOBBI C STERNHEIM a> 11/19/2020 10:25 AM >>> 
Good morning-
I am counsel for Ghislaine Maxwell 02879-509. 
EFTA00026460

I have a confirmed legal call scheduled for today (Thursday) 
and a confirmed in-person visit scheduled for Saturday 
with Ms.Maxwell 
I am informed that Ms. Maxwell received a nasal swab test yesterday 
and was being placed in the SHU for 14 days. 
Please confirm: 
-whether she is being quarantined; 
-whether she is being confined to the SHU 
If so, please explain: 
- the reason for the quarantine; 
- the duration of the quarantine; 
- whether she will be given legal calls; 
- whether her legal visits are canceled; 
- whether her legal materials and possessions have been transferred with her 
and in her possession; and 
- whether she is permitted to review electronic discovery. 
Your immediate response is requested and appreciated. 
I can be reached at 
Thank you-
Bobbi 
BOBS! C. STERNHEIM, ESQ. 
Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim 
New York, NY 10011 
Main: 
Cell: 
Fax: 
**Covid-19 Notice: The West 19th Street office is currently closed but we continue to work remotely. 
Please use email or fax, instead of regular mail, for all correspondence during this time. 
We continue to work regular business hours throughout this situation. 
Thank you for your consideration. Our best wishes for your good health and well being. 
This message and any attached documents contain information from the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim 
that may be confidential and/or privileged. 
If you are not the intended recipient, you may not read, copy, distribute, or use this information. 
If you have received this transmission in error, please notify the sender immediately by reply e-mail and then delete this 
message. Thank you. 
EFTA00026461
